testsuite.name: PostIntegrationSpec

testcase.name: Adding posts to user links post to user
Ensure posts linked to a user can be retrieved
Exercise tagging several posts with various tags
Ensure a user can follow other users
we can’t call Tag.addToPosts

failure.message:
Condition not satisfied:
tagMy.posts.collect {it.content} == ['Igorn post'] | | | | | | [Igor post] false | [com.grailsinaction.Post : 41] com.grailsinaction.Tag : 30

testcase.failure:
junit.framework.AssertionFailedError: Condition not satisfied:
tagMy.posts.collect {it.content} == ['Igorn post'] | | | | | | [Igor post] false | [com.grailsinaction.Post : 41] com.grailsinaction.Tag : 30
at com.grailsinaction.PostIntegrationSpec.we can’t call Tag.addToPosts(PostIntegrationSpec.groovy:99)

testsuite.system-out: --Output from Adding posts to user links post to user-- --Output from Ensure posts linked to a user can be retrieved-- --Output from Exercise tagging several posts with various tags-- --Output from Ensure a user can follow other users-- --Output from we can’t call Tag.addToPosts--
testsuite.system-err: --Output from Adding posts to user links post to user-- --Output from Ensure posts linked to a user can be retrieved-- --Output from Exercise tagging several posts with various tags-- --Output from Ensure a user can follow other users-- --Output from we can’t call Tag.addToPosts--

testsuite.name: UserIntegrationSpec

testcase.name: Saving our first user to the database
Updating a saved user changes its properties
Deleting an existing user removes it from the database
Saving a user with invalid properties causes an error
Recovering from a failed save by fixing invalid properties

testsuite.system-out: --Output from Saving our first user to the database-- --Output from Updating a saved user changes its properties-- --Output from Deleting an existing user removes it from the database-- --Output from Saving a user with invalid properties causes an error-- --Output from Recovering from a failed save by fixing invalid properties--
testsuite.system-err: --Output from Saving our first user to the database-- --Output from Updating a saved user changes its properties-- --Output from Deleting an existing user removes it from the database-- --Output from Saving a user with invalid properties causes an error-- --Output from Recovering from a failed save by fixing invalid properties--
